idea:
DVAAR means ‘door’ in Sanskrit. DVAAR is an initiative to create employment for villagers, and small manufacturers by creating sustainable and contemporary products that are kind to the user and the earth.


we decided to make  sustainable mats that are not harmful to us and the planet. At our store, you will see mats and accessories that are natural, or easier to recycle.


Our journey has just begun and we know we have a lot of learning and unlearning to do. Every dawn is turning into a day of revelation and realisation. There has been such tremendous support from so many people, and vendors who are on the same mission as us, that we strongly believe we are on the right path.

DVAAR. The door to your wellbeing!
name: DVAAR LIFESTYLE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
AuraShots is a division of AuraKomms Media Pictures Pvt. Ltd. It is a stock photo e-commerce portal that has a huge collection of classic Indian Images.


www.aurashots.com has a huge collection of classic Indian images crafted for your creative needs. Every image is carefully shot with a concept keeping in mind the advertisers, content developers, marketers, visualizers and creative professionals across the globe that will catalyse their imaginative ideas while shaping up the brands.


www.aurashots.com offers Indian Images of multiple types and dimensions catering to varied needs. Be it festivals, languages, religions, music, dance, architecture, food or art, India has a vibrant and diversified culture. In order to present this array of Indian culture and traditions, we have created a wide range of creative libraries at AuraShots by capturing different facets of India through our lenses.


Come, explore it!
name: Aurakomms Media Pictures Private Limited

idea: TS Comprozone Pvt. Ltd. (TSCPL) is a professionally managed, ISO 9001:2015 certified, medical device marketing, distribution and leasing solutions company operating since 2010 and engaged in the import, marketing and distribution of niche medical devices in India. TSCPL offers products and leasing solutions for surgical and therapeutic purpose with a primary focus on the range of laser services, thermal ablation systems and compression garments in vascular, intervention radiology, ENT, pain management, proctology and oncology.
name: TS COMPROZONE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We at the "Modern World" are an honest team with the new startup of providing Marketing and sales consultancy services for PAN India Geography, The hardcore experience of our team in related fields and our proven leadership experience in our professional carrier has motivated us to start the Modern world. We believe in Transforming Human Value to the next level, which will be an anon ongoing process of our core competency for all our associates, employees, channel partners, and clients. We at Modern Word are a hardcore diversified Service provider for marketing and sales and sales support and handling its operation for the companies who want to expand their distribution structure, build sales team structure and backend Management Information System (MIS) Team, and want to grow their brand presence at National and International level. Our Mission is to set up a strong network of sales and marketing at the front end and back end and develop a village-level distribution Network, supply chain support, and logistic solution for our clients, for various verticals, trades, and businesses. The structure of the organization will be led by an Experience, dedicated, and honest leadership team. Followed by a Young, strong, energetic, Operational team to handle operations and the hard and smart working executions team will strengthen the grass-root level of the organization and make its firm establishment ultimately which will benefit of our clients. We strongly believe in organizing at every micro-level and establishing control mechanism process at necessary check level and monitor the operation to achieve the desired result, for objective set and analyzing the business with the proper automated real-time reporting system, by deep diving into data for accurate interpretation and drawing a conclusion for achieving the set goals, targets, framing strategies and for business expansion.
name: VIDHYDHAR MAHADEV KAMBLE
